text: Viktor Borysovych Shvetsov (Ukrainian: Віктор Борисович Швецов, born 22 June 1969 in Odessa, Ukraine) is a Ukrainian professional football referee.Profile He has been a full international for FIFA since 2008.FIFA. "Ukraina: Referees". He served as a Fourth official at the Euro 2012. == References == ==External links== * Viktor Shvetsov at allplayers.in.ua Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Odessa Category:Ukrainian football referees
title: Viktor Shvetsov
